content:
Kitumu (Mother of Fireflies) [CE]

If any fervent devotees of the monstrous firefly goddess exist, they don't venture into civilization. The closest Kitumu has to servants or worshipers are those willing to placate the goddess in order to satisfy her demands and hungers.

Edicts offer sacrifices to Kitumu, feed the hungers of nature with humanoid creatures

Anathema step on a firefly, kill those marked by Kitumu

Follower Alignments NE, CE

Devotee Benefits

Divine Font harm
Divine Ability Dexterity or Charisma
Divine Skill Nature
Favored Weapon @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Greatclub]{Greatclub}
Domains destruction, indulgence, nightmare, swarm
Cleric SpellsÂ 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Sleep]{Sleep}, 2nd:@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Vomit Swarm]{Vomit Swarm}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Insect Form]{Insect Form}
name: Kitumu
